name: Purple-DiscordBot
description: An open-source discord bot with feaures such as memes, quotes, moderation and auto role assignment.

STAGE.description: In which stage do you want the bot to run in (PRODUCTION / DEVELOPMENT)

GENERAL_CHANNEL.description: The ID of your General Channel | Example: 893053479038357524

BOT_COMMANDS_CHANNEL.description: The ID of your Bot Commands Channel | Example: 908601642075693086

MEMBER_LOG_CHANNEL.description: The ID of your Member Log Channel | Example: 909047268513038397
